items.title: Migrating to Swift 6
items.content_html:
Swift 6 introduces strict concurrency checking. Here's how to migrate your project step by step.

Start by enabling StrictConcurrency as an upcoming feature flag.
items.summary: A step-by-step guide to migrating your project to Swift 6.

items.title: Advanced SwiftUI Animations
items.content_html: SwiftUI's animation system is powerful but has some surprising behaviours. Let's explore keyframe animations and spring physics.
items.summary: Exploring keyframe animations and spring physics in SwiftUI.
